title: Wireless Noise-Cancelling Headphones
description: Experience crystal-clear audio and immersive sound with our wireless noise-cancelling headphones. Designed for all-day comfort, these headphones feature soft ear cushions, up to 30 hours of battery life, and touch controls for seamless listening.

title: Smartwatch Series 5 Pro
description: Track your health, fitness, and notifications effortlessly with the Smartwatch Series 5 Pro. Equipped with heart-rate monitoring, GPS, and water resistance, it’s the perfect companion for your active lifestyle.

title: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Enjoy rich, powerful sound anywhere with this portable Bluetooth speaker. Compact yet loud, it offers 10-hour battery life and waterproof protection — ideal for outdoor parties and travel.

title: Ergonomic Laptop Backpack
description: Carry your essentials in comfort with this durable ergonomic laptop backpack. It includes multiple compartments, anti-theft zippers, and padded support for laptops up to 17 inches.

title: RGB Gaming Mouse
description: Dominate your gaming sessions with precision and style. The RGB Gaming Mouse features customizable lighting, 6 programmable buttons, and a high-precision 12,000 DPI optical sensor.

title: gaming Keyboard Pro
description: Type with confidence and speed using this gaming keyboard featuring red switches for tactile feedback, customizable RGB lighting, and a durable aluminum frame.

title: USB-C Fast Charging Cable
description: Charge your devices quickly and safely with this premium braided USB-C cable. It supports fast charging up to 60W and data transfer speeds of 480 Mbps.

title: 4K HDMI Cable UltraSpeed
description: Connect your devices with ease using this 4K HDMI UltraSpeed cable. Enjoy crystal-clear visuals, HDR support, and ultra-fast data transfer for TVs, monitors, and consoles.

title: Wireless Optical Mouse
description: A lightweight and ergonomic wireless mouse with silent clicks and long-lasting battery life. Perfect for both work and travel with plug-and-play connectivity.

title: Noise Cancelling Earbuds
description: Compact, comfortable, and powerful. These earbuds offer deep bass, clear highs, and active noise cancellation with 8 hours of playtime per charge.

title: Smart Wi-Fi Security Camera
description: Stay connected and secure with this high-definition Wi-Fi security camera. Features include night vision, motion alerts, two-way audio, and remote viewing from your smartphone or tablet.

title: Portable 1TB SSD Drive
description: Fast, reliable, and compact — this 1TB SSD offers read/write speeds up to 1000MB/s. Ideal for photographers, gamers, and professionals on the go.

title: Ergonomic Office Chair Deluxe
description: Stay comfortable during long work hours with this ergonomic office chair. It features lumbar support, breathable mesh, and adjustable height and tilt settings.

title: Wireless Charger Pad 15W
description: Charge your devices effortlessly with this slim 15W wireless charger. Compatible with all Qi-enabled devices and features temperature control for safety.

title: Fitness Tracker Band Plus
description: Track your steps, heart rate, sleep, and calories with precision. The Fitness Tracker Band Plus offers a bright display and 7-day battery life.

title: ErgoLift Pro Laptop Docking Station
description: Upgrade your workspace with the ErgoLift Pro Laptop Docking Station. Crafted from aerospace-grade aluminum, it provides ergonomic height adjustment, dual USB-C ports, and active cooling for your laptop — perfect for productivity and comfort.

title: Wireless Keyboard & Mouse Combo
description: Upgrade your setup with this wireless keyboard and mouse combo. Quiet, responsive, and energy-efficient with a 12-month battery life.

title: Smart Wi-Fi Plug
description: Control your appliances from anywhere with this smart plug. Set timers, monitor energy usage, and integrate with Alexa or Google Home.

title: Power Bank 10,000 mAh
description: Keep your devices charged on the go with this 10,000 mAh power bank. Dual USB outputs and fast-charging support make it a travel essential.

title: USB Flash Drive 64 GB
description: Compact and durable 64GB USB flash drive for everyday file transfers. Plug-and-play design, compatible with all major operating systems.
